Text: Thank you so much! I couldnt find 7 anywhere!

@deejus
this is a limited run comic, it ends after issue 8

The release date of these issues have been murder! Some issues were separated 4 months apart. Now we gotta wait for that elusive issue 8.
good graphic novel! i hope 8 is to released soon!!! thanks for the upload man : )
It's obvious that they're not going to release it till the movie is out, to ensure no one knows the ending till they see the movie. Standard marketing tactic.

Scratch what I said. The New kick-ass is out! It's included in a comic pack. Get it and seed!
